XXbsa013_u:1: ācārya nāgārjunakṛtam iha kaścit śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ śramaṇaḥ śravaṇa dhāraṇohāpohaśaktisampannaḥ śiṣya ācāryasya pāda [mūla] māgamya tathāgataśāsanamārabhya evaṃ pṛṣṭavān -
XXbsa013_u:2: bhagavan atra dvādaśa ye 'ṅgaviśeṣā muninoddiṣṭāḥ pratītyasambhūtāḥ /
XXbsa013_u:5: tasya teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tattvavubhutsāmavetya ācārya idamuktavān teṃ kleśakarmaduḥkheṣu saṅgṛhītāstriṣu[yathāvan] tatra daśa ca dvau ca dvādaśa /
XXbsa013_u:9: tena muninoddiṣṭāḥ kathitāḥ prakāśitā iti paryāyāḥ /
XXbsa013_u:13: te dvādaśāṅgaviśeṣāḥ kleśakarmaduḥkhā anyonyaṃ pratītya naḍakalāpayogena triṣu yathāvat saṃkṣiptāḥ
XXbsa013_u:18: kiṃ duḥkham yeṣu ime pratyayaviśeṣāḥ saṅgrahaṃ gacchanti /
XXbsa013_u:22: aṣṭamī tṛṣṇā, navamamupādānam ime trayaḥ kleśasaṅgṛhītāḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ /
XXbsa013_u:25: saṃskāro dvitīyaḥ bhavo daśamaḥ /[imā] dvau dharmau karmasaṅgṛhītau veditavyau /
XXbsa013_u:26: śeṣāḥ sapta ca duḥkham karmakleśasaṅgṛhītānā [maṅga] viśeṣāṇāṃ ye śeṣā[aṅga] viśeṣāḥ sapta ca te duḥkha[saṅgṛhītā] veditavyāḥ /
XXbsa013_u:27: tadyathā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā jātijarāmaraṇam /
XXbsa013_u:30: atra ete dvādaśa dharmāḥ karmakleśaduḥkhā[khyā] veditavyāḥ /[anyūnā]
XXbsa013_u:32: etāvanta eveme sūtrāntanirdiṣṭā nātaḥ paramastīti parigaṇitam // Phv_2 //
XXbsa013_u:34: kleśakarmaduḥkhānā[meṣāṃ] kutaḥ kimutpadyata iti vyākhyātuṃ prārthaye /
XXbsa013_u:36: tribhyā bhavati dvandvam kleśākhyebhyastribhyaḥ karmākhyaṃ dvandvamutpadyate /
XXbsa013_u:54: hetuphalañca hi jagat prajñaptiṃ vihāya anyo nāsti kaścidiha sattvaḥ /
XXbsa013_u:60: yadyevam, tarhi asmāllokāt kaḥ paralokaṃ saṅkrāmati /
XXbsa013_u:63: atha ca śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ // Pshk_4 //
XXbsa013_u:64: ātmātmīyarahitebhyo dharmebhyaḥ kleśakarmākhyebhyaḥ pañcahetubhyaḥ śūnyebhya ātmātmīyarahitā duḥkhatayā kathitāḥ phalakalpitāḥ śūnyāḥ sapta dharmāḥ prabhavantītyarthaḥ /
XXbsa013_u:69: atra svabhāvato 'nātmadharmebhya eva svabhāvato 'nātmadharmāḥ prabhavanti ityatra ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ
XXbsa013_u:79: śāśvata[ākhya] doṣaḥ syāt paraloke na saṅkramaḥ /
XXbsa013_u:82: yathā guruṇoccāritahetoḥ śiṣyeṇo[ccāritaḥ] sa eva anyo vā iti na nirṇetuṃ śakyate /
XXbsa013_u:83: tathā maraṇacittaṃ pratītya aupapattyaṃśikaṃ cittamapi tadeva tāto 'nyadvā iti na vaktuṃ śakyate
XXbsa013_u:89: te ca ta eva vā tato 'nye vā iti na jñātuṃ śakyate /
XXbsa013_u:95: asmāt lokātparalokaṃ na ko 'pi bhāvaḥ sūkṣmo 'pi saṅkrāmati /
XXbsa013_u:114: bhūtaśca bhūtato dṛṣṭvā bhūtadarśī vimucyate // Pshk_7 //
